name: Hostile (TeamASpev22)
description:
HOSTILE is a fast-paced single-player shooter inspired by classic shooters like Doom and Quake as well as newer fast-paced movement shooters. 

After a portal opens in a remote research base, the world is quickly overrun by an alien hoard.  It is up to the player to make their way back to where the portal was opened by fighting through a series of alien attacks.

Do you have what it takes to pick up a gun and vanquish the alien foes?

HOSTILE Includes:
  • 7 different weapons to choose from
  • 19 levels with 2 boss encounters
  • 8 enemy types
  • Classic movement (strafe-jump, rocket-jump, etc.)
  • 3 difficulty modes
Controls:
  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • E to open doors, press buttons, or pick up corpses
  • Left click to fire or throw
  • Weapon keybinds
    • 1: Sword
    • 2: Pistol
    • 3: Tri-Shot Pistol
    • 4: Pump Shotgun
    • 5: Rotary Machine Gun
    • 6: Plasma Pistol
    • 7: Inferno Rocket Launcher
Tips:
  • Always stay moving
    • Enemy projectiles move fast and deal serious damage
  • Moving the mouse side to side while strafe jumping greatly increases your speed
  • Swap weapons to conserve ammo types and efficiently deal damage
  • If you run out of ammo, press E to pick up enemy corpses to throw back at enemies

*If you encounter any bugs while playing, please report them so they can be fixed*

*Hostile is made by a single indie developer in Unreal Engine 4*
